extracted_playbook.title: Update Linux Distributions
extracted_playbook.description: Update all running Linux distributions that provided a backport of the fix for the Polkit vulnerability.

extracted_playbook.title: Update Ubuntu Systems
extracted_playbook.description: Update Ubuntu 14.04, 16.04 ESM, 18.04, 20.04, and 21.04 to include the backported fix.

extracted_playbook.title: Update RedHat Systems
extracted_playbook.description: Update RedHat Workstation and Enterprise products for supported architectures, including extended life cycle support, TUS, and AUS.

extracted_playbook.title: Update Debian Systems
extracted_playbook.description: Update Debian Stretch, Buster, Bellseye, and unstable versions to include the backported fix.

extracted_playbook.title: Reboot Systems
extracted_playbook.description: Reboot the systems if necessary after applying updates.

extracted_playbook.title: Apply Temporary Mitigation
extracted_playbook.description: Apply a temporary mitigation to prevent the privilege escalation vulnerability by changing the permissions of pkexec.

extracted_playbook.title: Search for Exploitation Attempts
extracted_playbook.description: Search for exploitation attempts by checking logs for specific suspicious strings.
